thread.title: The 7 Best Westerns On Netflix Streaming Right Now
thread.title_full: The 7 Best Westerns On Netflix Streaming Right Now

author: Christian Long
title: The 7 Best Westerns On Netflix Streaming Right Now
text:
By: Tresix 01.02.2017 @ 1:58 AM 
I’d have had “The Wild Bunch” and “How the West Was Won” (in honor of Debbie Reynolds). By: Brown Nose the Pirate 12.28.2016 @ 6:30 AM 
For those in The Netherlands: Once Upon a Time in the West is currently also playing in cinema at Eye in Amsterdam, until at least January 2nd. I once saw The Good, The Bad and The Ugly at a film festival, and damn was it worth it. These movies were made for the big screen. By: Blumpkin Pie 12.27.2016 @ 8:33 PM 
How the hell is No Country For Old Men not on here? I’d also include The Good, The Bad, and The Weird and The Missing if this were my list. By: MetRaider65 12.27.2016 @ 3:47 PM 
“The director offered the starring role to a young Charles Bronson”… Lol he was like almost 50.
